about_the_game:
Normans!

As the Jarl of a newly created small province in the Nordic realm, your goal will be to become the most powerful and respected Jarl of them all. As Jarl, you will have to establish a city and do everything to make it flamboyant. You will have to take care of the well-being of your citizens, take care of your finances as well as your army. As you progress, you will be faced with new objectives in order to guarantee the safety of your people as well as their extension throughout the kingdom.

NORTHMEN: Wrath of Vikings is the perfect combination of different gameplay of city building games. Get ready for hours of play.

Build your empire

Build your city as you see fit. Crossing dozens of buildings, the only limit will be your imagination.

Haggle

With several tradable goods through different types of trade (markets, trade route, trade ports, etc.), become the richest merchant.

Conquest

Set out to conquer new villages and cities in order to rally them under your banner.

Discover life in the "Viking" era

Dialogue with the population of your city to know their opinions under your governance and thus learn more about their needs.

Heimdall

Listen to Heimdall's valuable advice. The latter will help you make your city prosper thanks to his vision of your kingdom.

On the way ! The adventure is waiting for you!

short_description: NORTHMEN: Wrath of Vikings is a 2D isometric city-builder that plunges you into the heart of the Viking age. Build your city, gather resources and make it prosper over time. Rediscover the old-school style of city-building as you take on the challenges of the Viking Age.
